nodes.text: InterGalactic Banking Clan Collections and Security Division

The InterGalactic Banking Clan Collections and Security Division was the military branch of the InterGalactic Banking Clan and consisted of the Iotran Guard and the IG-series battle droid army, which was led by the Muun officer corps. San Hill promised the Banking Clan's droid forces to Count Dooku and the Confederacy of Independent Systems at the outbreak of the Clone Wars. During the Outer Rim Sieges, the Clan's forces were entrenched on the planet Mygeeto.
